import { Meta } from '@storybook/blocks'
import { ColorPalette, ColorItem } from '@storybook/blocks'
import { getGroupedRootCSSVariables } from '../../src/utils/getGroupedCSSVariables'

<Meta title="Design System/Colors DARK" />

# Color palette for `DARK` theme

<ColorPalette>
    {
        Object.entries(getGroupedRootCSSVariables(':root')).map(([title, pallette]) => {
            return <ColorItem key={title} title={title} colors={pallette} />
        })
    }
</ColorPalette>
